description: 'ピアソンの相関係数を、数値的に安定したアルゴリズムで計算します。'

title: 'corrStable'
doc_type: 'reference'
---



<!--AUTOGENERATED_START-->

## corrStable \{#corrStable\}

Introduced in: v1.1

Calculates the [Pearson correlation coefficient](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pearson_correlation_coefficient):

$$
\frac{\Sigma{(x - \bar{x})(y - \bar{y})}}{\sqrt{\Sigma{(x - \bar{x})^2} * \Sigma{(y - \bar{y})^2}}}
$$

<br />

Similar to the [`corr`](../reference/corr.md) function, but uses a numerically stable algorithm.
As a result, `corrStable` is slower than `corr` but produces a more accurate result.

**Syntax**

```sql
corrStable(x, y)
```

**引数**

- `x` — 第1変数。[`(U)Int*`](/sql-reference/data-types/int-uint)、[`Float*`](/sql-reference/data-types/float)、または[`Decimal`](/sql-reference/data-types/decimal)
- `y` — 第2変数。[`(U)Int*`](/sql-reference/data-types/int-uint)、[`Float*`](/sql-reference/data-types/float)、または[`Decimal`](/sql-reference/data-types/decimal)

**戻り値**

ピアソン相関係数を返します。[`Float64`](/sql-reference/data-types/float)

**例**

**安定したアルゴリズムによる基本的な相関計算**

```sql title=Query
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS series;
CREATE TABLE series
(
    i UInt32,
    x_value Float64,
    y_value Float64
)
ENGINE = Memory;
INSERT INTO series(i, x_value, y_value) VALUES (1, 5.6, -4.4),(2, -9.6, 3),(3, -1.3, -4),(4, 5.3, 9.7),(5, 4.4, 0.037),(6, -8.6, -7.8),(7, 5.1, 9.3),(8, 7.9, -3.6),(9, -8.2, 0.62),(10, -3, 7.3);

SELECT corrStable(x_value, y_value)
FROM series
```

```response title=Response
┌─corrStable(x_value, y_value)─┐
│          0.17302657554532558 │
└──────────────────────────────┘
```

<!--AUTOGENERATED_END-->
